Rotonda Golf Memberships
Rotonda Golf & Country Club
Whether you have been golfing your entire life, or have just begun to appreciate the game, Rotonda Golf & Country Club offers a membership option that suits you. Our challenging courses and friendly staff ensures our members will enjoy bringing guests out for a drink, as well as perfecting their game.
We encourage you to request a tour of our facility, and welcome any questions you may have. For additional information about pricing and our application process, please fill out this form or call us at 941.697.2414. We look forward to hearing from you.
Memberships
All memberships options include 99 Holes of Golf
5 Golf Courses to choose from every day
FREE Range Balls
Advance Tee Time privileges
10% Pro Shop Discount
Never any assessments
No food and beverage requirements
No charge Handicap index through the USGA/ Florida State Golf Association.
Call
941-697-2414
for more information on joining Rotonda Golf & Country Club!
Members Enjoy Free use of our Fairway Fitness Exercise room and Pickleball Courts
2025 Membership Packages
Single Membership Initiation – $375
Family Membership Initiation – $750
One Year Family
Long Marsh, Palms, Hills, Pinemoor, and Links for
$3,800.00
One Year Single
Long Marsh, Palms, Hills, Pinemoor, and Links for
$2,650.00
Two Year Family
Long Marsh, Palms, Hills, Pinemoor, and Links for
$6,460.00
Two Year Single
Long Marsh, Palms, Hills, Pinemoor, and Links for
$4,505.00
